alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Until the scientific world recovers its good sense and takes another look at the mysteries of our cosmos with the aether in mind and Einstein ignored we really have no hope of inspiring future science students and gaining a better understanding of the phenomena which dominate, indeed constitute, our very existence."

- Harold Aspden, The Creation Of The Proton
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Education's Aether Problem
